overview: A photographic and video lament on race, class, and space in one of Chicago's westernmost neighborhoods â€“ Austin. Beginning in the late 1960s, Austin experienced dramatic demographic changes due to white flight, redlining, and economic disinvestment. Both an expression of what is on the surface and what emerges when one takes a moment to look deeply, this project aims to capture the ongoing effects of these changes in the everyday lives of Austin residents.
title: Hail Mary
